name: Carnival Cruise Lines Tycoon 2005: Island Hopping
name_original: Carnival Cruise Lines Tycoon 2005: Island Hopping
description:
Carnival Cruise Lines Tycoon 2005: Island Hopping is a strategy game developed by Artex Software. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by Activision Value Publishing.
Carnival Cruise Lines Tycoon 2005: Island Hopping is available on PC.
